alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 6:59PM CDT until July 30 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 659 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Semmes, or 9 miles northwest of Midtown Mobile, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Tillmans Corner, Theodore, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Semmes, Coden, I10 And I65, Mobile Regional Airport, and Alabama Port. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
